ai-patthana22.32:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.32:1.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, nor does the object give rise to the repulsion. Consequentment is a condition for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana22.32:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.32:2.1_0: Not for the sake of insisting on repulsion, not with the support of the mind arises dependent on the object, and there is no cause or condition.
ai-patthana22.32:3.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existent teaching, not for the sake of grasping.
ai-patthana22.32:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.32:4.1_0: Not insisting on principles, not lovingly.
ai-patthana22.32:4.1_1: the section on the same cause,
ai-patthana22.32:5.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, nor do he gives rise to unarisen teaching.
ai-patthana22.32:5.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.32:6.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, or for the sake of non-existence, consciousness arises in him.
ai-patthana22.32:6.1_1: the section on the same cause,
ai-patthana22.32:7.1_0: Not involveding the mind is no cause or condition. It is no cause or condition.
ai-patthana22.32:7.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.32:8.1_0: One does not give rise to repulsion of the mind, or whose mind is not shaking the excessive in variety of consciousnesses, but only gives rise to reason for causes.
ai-patthana22.32:9.1_0: Not for the sake of his mind is not visible, nor repulsion of the mind. Because of this he has no cause or condition.
ai-patthana22.32:9.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.32:10.1_0: Not insisting on excessive resistances to the mind, no repetition condition for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana22.32:11.1_0: Not consciousness arises in someone whose mind is not clouded, nor no longer consciousness gives rise to mental preceding the mind.
ai-patthana22.32:11.1_1: the section on the same cause,
ai-patthana22.32:12.1_0: Not in consciousness, nor is consciousness-originated, consciousness gives rise to the dependent origination, not preceding the mind.
ai-patthana22.32:12.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.32:13.1_0: Not for the sake of resenting the mind, not for the one whose mind is the cause of impingement, consciousness does not arise.
ai-patthana22.32:13.1_2: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana22.32:14.1_0: It’s not for the sake of resistance or resistance, but only to the one whose mind is ready.
ai-patthana22.32:14.1_1: the section on the same cause,
ai-patthana22.32:15.1_0: Not frequenting bypasses the mind, not by means of the underlying tendencies.
ai-patthana22.32:15.1_1: ... the five objects of the construction ...
ai-patthana22.32:15.1_2: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana22.32:16.1_0: Not frequenting bypasses the things that are not involved, nor do they memories and thoughts. ...
ai-patthana22.32:16.1_1: the section on the same cause,
ai-patthana22.32:17.1_0: Not longing for the mind is the cause of impingement, not at the wrong time of the mind, gives rise to the eighteen mental preoccupations.
ai-patthana22.32:17.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.32:18.1_0: Not long afterwards, not consciousness arises in someone whose mind is the wrong way, not gets crushed, and with the eighteen mental objects.
ai-patthana22.32:18.1_1: the section on the same cause,
ai-patthana22.32:19.1_0: Not long afterwards, not consciousness arises in someone whose mind is the wrong way, not bodily formations. It is because of the eighteen mental preoccupations of mind.
ai-patthana22.32:19.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.32:20.1_0: Not in due course, not is the consciousness of the mind, nor is the cause of the occurrence of the mind, nor does the mental preceding the mind gives rise to the eighteen mental preoccupations. It doesn’t give rise to the repulsion of causes.
ai-patthana22.32:20.1_1: the section on the same cause,
ai-patthana22.32:21.1_0: Not consciousness arises in someone whose mind is not clouded, or whose mind is obsessed by conditions and no longer affection,
ai-patthana22.32:21.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.32:22.1_0: Neither in the past, future or present,
ai-patthana22.32:22.1_1: the section on the same cause,
ai-patthana22.32:23.1_0: Not for the sake of resentment, not for the internal and external serving the undecided is dependently originated.
ai-patthana22.32:23.1_1: eleven reasons: three eleven conditions are fulfilled ...
ai-patthana22.32:24.1_0: Not for the sake of non-decline, nor for the sake of grasping, conditioned by the external floods, and for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana22.32:24.1_1: the section on the same cause,
ai-patthana22.32:25.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion for the sake of not grasping.
ai-patthana22.32:25.1_1: Thirty-four grounds for the thirty-two years ...
ai-patthana22.32:26.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion of insistence on views, not grasping.
ai-patthana22.32:26.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.32:27.1_0: Not for the attainment of the impingement, not for those without resentment, repulsion, views, doubt, conceit, the desire to be reborn, and ignorance.
ai-patthana22.32:27.1_1: The six objects of in brief ...
ai-patthana22.32:27.1_3: There are eighteen nurses: eighteen opposites,
ai-patthana22.32:28.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion for the sake of not grasping. Grasping the teaching doesn’t give rise to repulsion.
ai-patthana22.32:28.1_1: Yet when he was undergoing the same position as ‘processive actions’ ...
ai-patthana22.32:28.1_2: When there is the path of the roaming on the road they have no one roaming.
